Package com.millicast.android_app

Class SourceInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.millicast.android_app.SourceInfo
  • public class SourceInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Information about a subscribed media source. This includes: Media sourceId, lists of audio and video trackIds, and lists of layers.

        private java.lang.String[] trackIdVideoList

      • layerActiveMap

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​LayerData> layerActiveMap
        Map of layerId : LayerData of currently active Layers. LayerId is obtained via getLayerId(java.util.Optional<LayerData>).

      • layerActiveList

        private LayerData[] layerActiveList
        An array of currently active LayerData for this Source.

      • layerListStr

        private java.lang.String layerListStr
        A defined String representation (via getLayerListStr(LayerData[])) of the current layerActiveList, that can be quickly used for comparison when trying to set a new layerActiveList.

      • layerActiveId

        private java.lang.String layerActiveId
        The layerId {from @link #getLayerId} of the selected Layer. The default value, an empty String (""), indicates automatic layer selection by the Millicast platform, provided there is at least 1 active layer.

        public static Utils.LambdaToString lambdaLayerToString
        Get a String representation of a LayerData.

      • getProjectionData

        public java.util.ArrayList<Subscriber.ProjectionData> getProjectionData​(java.lang.String mid,
                                                                        boolean forAudio)
        Get an ArrayList of com.millicast.Subscriber.ProjectionData for all the audio or video tracks of this MediaInfo.
        Parameters:
        mid - The mid onto which this source is requested to be projected onto.
        forAudio -
        Returns:

      • setLayerActiveList

        public boolean setLayerActiveList​(LayerData[] layerActiveList)
        Set the layerActiveMap of this Source if this list differs from the last one set. If set, the selected layerActiveId would be reset to default ("").
        Parameters:
        layerActiveList -
        Returns:
        True if a new layerActiveList was set, and false otherwise.

      • getLayerActiveIdList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getLayerActiveIdList()
        Get the layerId (from getLayerId(java.util.Optional<LayerData>)) list of the current active layers. If there is at least one layer, include an empty String ("") at index 0 as the layer automatically selected by Millicast. If there are no active layers, list returned will have size 0.
        Returns:

      • getLayerActiveId

        public java.lang.String getLayerActiveId()
        The layerId layerActiveId of the currently selected Layer. An empty String ("") indicates that the layer is automatically selected by Millicast.
        Returns:

      • setLayerActiveId

        public boolean setLayerActiveId​(java.lang.String layerId)
        Set the layerId layerActiveId of the currently selected Layer. An empty String ("") indicates that the layer is automatically selected by Millicast.
        Parameters:
        layerId -
        Returns:
        True if successful, false if the layerId is not available in the list of layers.

      • getLayerData

        public java.util.Optional<LayerData> getLayerData()
        Get an Optional LayerData of the selected Layer of this source. An empty Optional indicates that the layer is automatically selected by Millicast.
        Returns:
        The Optional or null if either: - There is no active layer. - The layer specified by the layerActiveId cannot be found.

      • getLayerData

        public java.util.Optional<LayerData> getLayerData​(java.lang.String layerId)
        Get an Optional LayerData of the Layer of this source that has the given layerActiveId. An empty Optional indicates that the layer is automatically selected by Millicast.
        Returns:
        The Optional or null if the layer specified by the layerId cannot be found.

public static java.lang.String getLayerListStr​(LayerData[] layerList)

      • getLayerId

        public static java.lang.String getLayerId​(java.util.Optional<LayerData> layerDataOpt)
        Get the layerId, an unique id that represents the given Layer. An empty Optional indicates that the layer is automatically selected by Millicast.
        Parameters:
        layerDataOpt -
        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getLayerStr

        public static java.lang.String getLayerStr​(java.util.Optional<LayerData> layerDataOpt,
                                           boolean longForm)
        Get a String representation of an Optional of LayerData. An empty Optional indicates that the layer is automatically selected by Millicast. String representation as given in #getLayerStr(LayerData, boolean).

      • getLayerStr

        public static java.lang.String getLayerStr​(LayerData ld,
                                           boolean longForm)
        Get a String representation of a LayerData. The default representation is:

        encodingId(T:temporalLayerId S:spatialLayerId)

        Long form representation:

        encodingId(T:temporalLayerId/maxTemporalLayerId S:spatialLayerId/maxSpatialLayerId)
        Parameters:
        ld - The LayerData for which to get a String.
        longForm - true to use the long form, false otherwise.
        Returns:

        Populate the layerActiveMap using the given layerList.
        Parameters:
